name: Zylot - True Visionary (Go Further Back) - Serge - Mashpotato 1

wave_0_per_point1=x = .5 + (bass*.2)*sin(sample*2*(time*10*treb));
wave_0_per_point2=y = .5 + (bass*.2)*cos(sample*2*(time*10*treb));
wave_0_per_point3=r = 1 + .5*sin(sample*.10+(time*10*bass));
wave_0_per_point4=g = 1 + .5*sin(sample*2+(time*50*treb));
wave_0_per_point5=b = 1 + .5*sin(sample*5+(time*30*mid));
wave_0_per_point6=a = r;

shape_1_per_frame1=ang = ang - time*.333;

shape_2_per_frame1=ang = ang + time*4;

shapecode_3_sides=4
shapecode_3_additive=0
shapecode_3_thickOutline=0
shapecode_3_textured=0
shapecode_3_num_inst=1
shapecode_3_x=0.500
shapecode_3_y=0.500
shapecode_3_rad=0.10000
shapecode_3_ang=0.00000
shapecode_3_tex_ang=0.00000
shapecode_3_tex_zoom=1.00000
shapecode_3_r=1.000
shapecode_3_g=0.000
shapecode_3_b=0.000

shapecode_3_g2=1.000
shapecode_3_b2=0.000
shapecode_3_a2=0.000
shapecode_3_border_r=1.000
shapecode_3_border_g=1.000
shapecode_3_border_b=1.000
shapecode_3_border_a=0.100
per_frame_init_1=tbb = 0;
per_frame_1=warp = 0;
per_frame_2=q1 = treb_att*.006;
per_frame_3=q2 = mid_att*.006;
per_frame_4=dx = dx + (q1*.3)*cos(time*32);
per_frame_5=dy = dy + (q1*.3)*sin(time*23);
per_frame_6=
per_frame_7=tbss = if(above(bass_att,tbss),bass-att,tbss+((bass_att-tbss)*.25)-((tbss-bass_att)*.25));
per_frame_8=
per_frame_9=q4 = tbss;
per_pixel_1=zoom = zoom + (.01*(bass_att*1.2*bass_att))*(pow(rad,2)*3);
per_pixel_2=rot = rot + rad*(-2.5|(cos(time)*5))*.01;
warp_1=`sampler sampler_worms;
warp_2=`float3 color, mus;
warp_3=`float dx,dy;
warp_4=`shader_body {
warp_5=`float2 uv1 = (uv-.5) * aspect.xy;
warp_6=`
warp_7=`
warp_8=`float2 uv6 = uv1;
warp_9=`float z = q29*2*length(uv1)+rand_frame * 64;
warp_10=`float2 d = normalize(uv1);
warp_11=`float2 rs = clamp(tan(z)*d,-8,8);
warp_12=`uv += .004*GetBlur1(uv)*float2 (0,1);//rs/20;
warp_13=`
warp_14=`
warp_15=`uv6 = .4*sin(uv1*18*rand_frame);
warp_16=`mus = .051/(length(uv6));
warp_17=`mus *= float3 (treb*.5,bass*.5,mid*.5);
warp_18=`
warp_19=`float3 blur = GetBlur2(frac(uv));
warp_20=`
warp_21=`float3 crisp= tex2D(sampler_main,uv);
warp_22=`
warp_23=`float3 ret1 = crisp - blur*.03 + .15*mus;
warp_24=`float2 uv2 = (uv_orig-.5)-float3(bass*.1,treb*.1+0.1*q25,mid*.1);
warp_25=`
warp_26=`q25 = 1;
warp_27=`ret = q25*(ret1*.99-.01) + (1-q25)* GetPixel(uv_orig);
warp_28=`
warp_29=`}
comp_1=`shader_body
comp_2=`{
comp_3=`
comp_4=`
comp_5=`
comp_6=`float2 uva = uv;
comp_7=`float2 uvb = float2(1-uv.x,uv.y);
comp_8=`
comp_9=`ret = tex2D(sampler_main, uva).x + tex2D(sampler_main, uvb).x;
comp_10=`
comp_11=`float3 blurs = GetBlur1(uva).x + GetBlur3(uva).x;
comp_12=`blurs += GetBlur1(uvb).x + GetBlur3(uvb).x;
comp_13=`
comp_14=`
comp_15=`float2 uv3 = (uv-.5)*(1-GetBlur1(uv).zzz)+.5;
comp_16=`ret += saturate(pow(tex2D(sampler_main, uv3).zzz,.5)*(1-ret.x*2)),
comp_17=`ret += saturate(pow(GetBlur1(uv3).zzz,.5)*(1-ret.x*2)),
comp_18=`
comp_19=`
comp_20=`ret = lerp (
comp_21=`blurs,
comp_22=`ret,
comp_23=`pow(ret,1));
comp_24=`
comp_25=`ret = pow(ret,float3(13,13,15));
comp_26=`float4 noise9 = tex3D(sampler_noisevol_hq, 
comp_27=`                      ((uv3.xyy*q28
comp_28=`                       )*texsize.xyy*texsize_noisevol_hq.zww
comp_29=`                      ).xyz*
comp_30=`                      float3(11,1,0)*0.05 + 
comp_31=`                      time*float3(0,0,1)*q31
comp_32=`                     );
comp_33=`if(ret.x> q26*q13         && ret.x<= q23*q11        )ret.z -= (noise9).x*.5; 
comp_34=`if(ret.y> q25*q11         && ret.y<= q22*q12        )ret.x -= (noise9).y*.5; 
comp_35=`if(ret.z> q24*q12         && ret.z<= q21*q13        )ret.y -= (noise9).z*.5; 
comp_36=`//ret += pow(tex2D(sampler_main, float2(uv.x,1-uv.y)).yyy+tex2D(sampler_main, 1-uv).yyy,float3(3.6,3.5,.5));
comp_37=`
comp_38=`
comp_39=`}
